title.rendered: India vs Sri Lanka, 1st T20I: Fantasy Team, Probable Playing XIs, Pitch Report, Smart Fantasy Picks & Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
Fantasy Cricket Team for India vs Sri Lanka, 1st T20I

We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable India & Sri Lanka Playing XIs

India: Ishan Kishan, Shubman Gill, Suryakumar Yadav, Sanju Samson (wk), Hardik Pandya (c), Deepak Hooda/Washington Sundar, Axar Patel/Washington Sundar, Harshal Patel, Umran Malik, Arshdeep Singh, Yuzvendra Chahal

Sri Lanka: Pathum Nissanka, Kusal Mendis (wk), Charith Asalanka/Avishka Fernando, Dhananjaya de Silva, Bhanuka Rajapaksa, Dasun Shanaka (c), Wanindu Hasaranga, Chamika Karunaratne, Maheesh Theekshana, Kasun Rajitha, Lahiru Kumara

Pitch Report for India vs Sri Lanka, 1st T20I Match at Wankhede

Venue: Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai

1st innings average score: 192

2nd innings average score: 182

Type: A batting beauty.

Weather: Clear.

Wins

Batting 1st: 29%

Batting 2nd: 71%

Fantasy Tips of the Day

The wicket offers some lateral movement with the new ball, but the true bounce rather makes the batters comfortable. Nothing but accuracy matters in Mumbai.

It was Sri Lanka’s top order and all-rounders that collected most of the fantasy points last year.

Smart Fantasy Picks for the Match

Dasun Shanaka has smashed the most runs (306) against India. With the ball, he has fetched 12 wickets, including the best figures of 3 for 16.

In the T20Is between these teams, Yuzvendra Chahal is the highest wicket-taker. He has managed 20 wickets in a mere 10 games.

In his last 5 T20Is against India, Wanindu Hasaranga has scalped 8 wickets. Above all, in his previous game in the Sri Lanka T20 League, he blasted 77* off 34. He will be itching to bat on the Wankhede featherbed.

Pathum Nissanka was the top run-scorer in 2022 for Sri Lanka. In 24 outings, he collected 713 runs at an impressive average of 31.

Speaking of top players, Suryakumar Yadav couldn’t have performed better last year: 1,164 runs at a strike rate of 187. More importantly, he will be batting at the Wankhede Stadium, where he plays the bulk of his cricket.

Be it with the new or old ball, Arshdeep Singh has been consistently taking wickets. He appeared in the Ultimate Team in 4 of his last 5 T20Is.

In the wicketkeeper category, fantasy players have class-apart choices. While Kusal Mendis averaged 28 last year, Ishan Kishan has 125 runs in 3 matches against Sri Lanka. However, Sanju Samson has superior fantasy stats: his Ultimate Team percentage reads 100% in his last 5 matches.

Hardik Pandya has incredible numbers at the Wankhede Stadium. In 45 competitive T20s, he has churned out 889 runs at an average of 34 and sniped up 35 wickets.

Ready with your team? Play fantasy Cricket on My11Circle now!
